description:
By collecting prizes, new content is released and coins are easily increased. Online multiplayer for up to five players is possible. Furthermore, you can use the coins you earn to upgrade your own coin shooter.

* Upgrades
Reduce the shot interval, increase the movement speed, and expand the size of the box.

* Online Multi Play
There are random matching and friend matching where you can play only with your friends. With random matching, you can enjoy a once-in-a-lifetime experience; with friend matching, you can have fun in private; and of course, you can play solo, so you can enjoy the game in your preferred play style.

* Co-op event
There is a demon extermination event where you have to kill demons, and a jar game where you have to put coins into a jar like a ball game. It looks easy, but it is quite difficult, but don't be afraid. Don't be afraid, because you can cooperate with other players. However, it's not impossible to clear solo.

* Prize collection
You can collect various prizes typical of the Old japan. Depending on the number of items collected, the player will gain an advantageous effect.
name: Old Coin Pusher Friends
